name: Futile | Pixels
description:
PIXEL PERFECT

Futile | Pixels is a top-down action micro game about dodging turrets that keep appearing.  All eyes are on you as you traverse a limited area constantly filling up with death pixels.

How long can you survive?

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

GAME FEATURES
  • 2x enemy types
  • Pixel graphics
  • Instant death!
  • Minimalist prototype in action
